name: Ancient Warriors - Ingenious Zhuge Kong
effectText: If this card is added from the Deck to your hand by the effect of an "Ancient Warriors" card: You can Special Summon it. When a Spell/Trap Card is activated (Quick Effect): You can send 1 face-up "Ancient Warriors" Continuous Spell/Trap you control to the GY; negate the activation. When a monster effect is activated while you control "Ancient Warriors - Virtuous Liu Xuan" (Quick Effect): You can send 1 face-up "Ancient Warriors" Continuous Spell/Trap you control to the GY; negate the activation. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Warriors - Ingenious Zhuge Kong" once per turn.
